text: assuqunxak xixxibisak sugen mara (israa-iil xaylo kinnuk) Shaam deqsitta baax칩y barkat elle oobisnek ayr칩 mawqaay ayr칩 korma ken nagarsisne, Nabiyow ku Rabbik meqe Qangarah xaganay israa-iil xayloh hee duudeh firqawnaa kee kay marih adal yisbireenimih sabbatah baaxol reed치 leeh miroctih yan mara ken abne, firqawnaa kee kay mari qarwaay silaacak bicisak suggu iyyeenim kee buqree kee busaatinik xisak sugeenim bayisneh
